text.section: Except as otherwise provided in subsection (2) of this section, KRS 369.101 to 369.120 applies to electronic records and electronic signatures relating to a transaction.

KRS 369.101 to 369.120 applies to an electronic record or electronic signature otherwise excluded from the application of KRS 369.101 to 369.120 under subsection (2) of this section to the extent it is governed by a law other than those specified in subsection (2) of this section.
A transaction subject to KRS 369.101 to 369.120 is also subject to other applicable substantive law.

law.history: Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 301, sec. 3, effective August 1, 2000.
